definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: A big advertising campaign to promote our new toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 推銷我廠新牙膏的一場大的廣告宣傳攻勢。

sentences.english: State and local governments are readying their publicity machines.
sentences.chinese: 州政府和各地政府也都準備好了宣傳攻勢。

sentences.english: The North has also been angered by a renewed propaganda drive from the South.
sentences.chinese: 北方對來自南方的新一輪的宣傳攻勢，也感到惱怒。

sentences.english: Once Cold is granted asylum, the propaganda is dialed up.
sentences.chinese: 科爾德被允許避難之後，宣傳攻勢立即升級。
